azuremonitor.description: Azure Monitor access for Azure Data Studio
azuremonitor.objectsListProperties.name: Name
azuremonitor.connectionProperties.userNa: Indicates the user ID to be used when connecting to the data source
azuremonitor.connectionProperties.passwo: Indicates the password to be used when connecting to the data source
azuremonitor.connectionProperties.metada: This attribute indicates whether the metadata information for executed queries is cached for improved performance.
azuremonitor.connectionProperties.proxyU: User name of the proxy user.
azuremonitor.connectionOptions.databaseN: The name of the initial catalog or database in the data source
azuremonitor.connectionProperties.authTy: Specifies the method of authenticating with Azure Monitor
